abstract: Karen Olsson article profiles writer, director and voice-actor Mike Judge, who has resurrected his 1990s animated television show Beavis and Butt-Head, 12 episodes of which will be shown on the MTV channel.
snippet: In the 1990s, Mike Judge unleashed a pair of giggling cultural commentators. Now they’re back, returning to a very different culture.
lead_paragraph: In the 1990s, Mike Judge unleashed a pair of giggling cultural commentators. Now they’re back, returning to a very different culture.

headline.main: The Eternal Adolescence of Beavis and Butt-Head
headline.print_headline: The Dumbest Guys In The Room
headline.seo: The Eternal Adolescence of Beavis and Butt-Head
